overview: Anyone who`s ever been with a bunch of lads on a camping trip knows that the canvas has a strange, hyped-up effect on the male libido - and needless to say there`s no exception to that rule here! Indeed, these horny young fellows are stripped off at the very first chance; their handsome, uncut dicks as proud and erect as their tent-poles! It`s not long before every hole is being filled by thick, meaty, uncut meat, as this gang of cock-crazed campers get back to nature in the most carnal fashion imaginable by spunking all over each other!
title: Bareback Sleepover Boys
